timeline.bodyText: Should this be named similarly to the existing doesNotCollide?
timeline.author: Gegy

replies.bodyText: Hmm, didn't notice those. I could rename method_30635 to doesNotCollide, same as the others, but I don't really like that name.
replies.author: Pyrofab

replies.bodyText: Might be worth renaming them both to like isBoxEmpty? I don't know if that would go out of scope for this PR, though.
replies.author: Gegy

replies.bodyText: Feel free to rename the existing doesNotCollide to isSpaceEmpty.
replies.author: liach
